attributes.review: This app took 95 hours to download, and when I opened it, my entire phone was wiped and my phone number was changed! Please avoid this dangerous app.

attributes.title: Horrible😤

attributes.review: This app gave me about 27 viruses and its not clickbait i'm wrote this of a money telephone Cause my phone is completely off limits it doesn't work at all i don't recommend it vote for KANYE

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: Days after downloading this app, my phone was hacked and filled with trump 2020 and racist messages. My phone then proceeded to blow up in my pocket all while blasting Trump’s speech at Mt. Rushmore. I was left with burn marks on my side. DO NOT RECOMMEND I HAD TO GO BUY A NEW PHONE BECAUSE OF THIS CHEETO LOOKING, CORN HAIR HAVING PRESIDENT OF OURS!!!

attributes.title: -12 stars
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to worship my lord and savior Donald Trump. However, after I opened the app I woke up in the morning to confederate flags surrounding me in my room, and "heil donny 2020" written on my ceiling. I believe this app may be cursed

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: If I could rate this app a zero I would. Don’t waste your time. Too many glitches. Provides inaccurate information.

attributes.title: Dont bother!!
attributes.review: I was more than ready to support our genius and incredible president but the app NEVER opened!! Such a shame that i will never know the wonders of this app😔 i guess #settleforbiden2020

attributes.title: Absolutely HORRIBLE!!!!!
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app all that happened was a racist sex offender orange who gave me a virus from all the p0rN that’s on this app!!!!!! I swear once I would get on the app just P0rN!!!!!! I got 2,000 viruses in total( and yes I counted)!!!!!
